com.acloudysky.drive

Class FileCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acloudysky.drive.FileCommands

  • public class FileCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the methods which issue Google Drive REST API calls for file operations.
    Author:
    Michael

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public void getFile(java.lang.String fileID,
                    java.lang.String dir,
                    java.lang.String localFile)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a file metadata. Also copies content to a local file.
        Parameters:
        fileID - The ID of the file for which to get the metadata.
        dir - The directory containing the copied file.
        localFile - The file where to copy the content.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An I/O error has been detected.

      • listFiles

        public void listFiles()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the list of user's files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An I/O error has been detected.

      • insertFile

        public com.google.api.services.drive.model.File insertFile(java.lang.String title,
                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                           java.lang.String parentId,
                                                           java.lang.String mimeType,
                                                           java.lang.String filename)
        Inserts new file.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the file to insert, including the extension.
        description - Description of the file to insert.
        parentId - Optional parent folder's ID.
        mimeType - MIME type of the file to insert.
        filename - Filename of the file to insert.
        Returns:
        Inserted file metadata if successful, null otherwise.

      • isFileInFolder

        public boolean isFileInFolder(java.lang.String folderId,
                              java.lang.String fileId)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if a file is in a specific folder
        Parameters:
        folderId - ID of the folder.
        fileId - ID of the file.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the file is in the folder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An I/O error has been detected.

      • getPsrents

        public void getPsrents(java.lang.String fileID)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the parents of a file.
        Parameters:
        fileID - The ID of the file whose parents must be found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An I/O error has been detected.
